<p>We enjoy solving your organization's data problems whether it is an FMCG company struggling to track and monitor its products or a declining E-Commerce company with low customer retention and high competition.\
Our Business Analysts and Data Scientists can help you solve your business problems by putting data science, research and automation to extract actionable insights of your business data. Our growing work reference is indication of the quality service we provide to our clients.</p>

<h5 class="card-title">

Analysing Pakistan Health Sector

</h5>

<p class="card-text">

How has Pakistan performed in Public Health Parameters, Social Living Measurement & Burden of Disease Indicators? What are the benchmarks set by SDG, and how is Pakistan performing? We conducted a collaborative study with the help of Indus Hospital & Health Networks and Sifat Associates to provide a broad understanding of health deficiencies experienced by Most Disadvantaged Districts (MDDs) in Pakistan.

</p>

<h5 class="card-title">

Infant Mortality Modelling

</h5>

<p class="card-text">

The MDG target for Infant Mortality was 40 per 1000 live births, while Pakistan stood at 62 per 1000 live births. We analyzed the causes of Infant Mortality in Pakistan and why Pakistan lags behind ? Are there demographic variations or the mother's social and health factors? We developed and deployed a Machine learning model for infants' survival chances based on PDHS 2017-2018 data.

</p>
:::

::: card-body
<h5 class="card-title">

Clustering Countries

</h5>

<p class="card-text">

HELP International wanted to identify countries that were in direst need of help for their financial aid programme. We analyzed data from countries based on their socioeconomic and health indicators. Through this, the overall development levels of the country were determined. Subsequently, they were categorized accordingly by using clustering techniques, and the least developed countries were then identified.

</p>

National Electronic Injury Surveillance Data Exploration

</h5>

<p class="card-text">

Some population groups are at increased risk of injury because of greater exposure to hazards, decreased ability to avoid hazards, or reduced resistance to injury Some groups have a lower likelihood of complete recovery or survival once injured. This interactive shiny application helps explore injury patterns.

Product Recommendation

</h5>

Stock Volatility Forecasting

</h5>

<p class="card-text">

With a successful volatility model, we can gain insights about future market behavior over time and spot trends that make investors align their portfolios with the associated expected returns. In this study, we compared Econometric & Deep learning techniques of stock volatility forecasting.
